DES External works to match existing
description: Variation of condition 1 and removal of condition 11 of planning permission dated 5th June 2024 (RN:23/08666/FULL)  (as amended by Ref: 25/02676/NMA) for the 'Demolition and replacement of the single storey roof structure; infill of a ground floor lightwell to the south of the rear podium section and erection of one additional storey on the podium section; creation of a new internal ground floor courtyard; alterations and recladding of the east façade; creation of new entrance, access ramps and planters to the west facade on Bryanston Square; incorporation of new solar blinds; and installation of solar panels and green roofs and other planting at roof level; Replacement of main entrance doors and glazing on north and west elevations. Internal alterations at all floor levels. (SITE INCLUDES 21 BRYANSTON SQUARE)' NAMELY, a change of materiality of the east façade to retain more of the existing structure and remove the approved PV tiles, relocation of the residents entrance from Bryanston Mews East to the colonnade on Montagu Place, minor changes to detailing of the fifth-floor façade to better match the existing façades below, confirmation of the permitted height of the rooftop PV, addition of a hidden gate to the Bryanston Square railings to improve access by the fire brigade in the event of a fire and development of M&E grille requirements. (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
